Hello Michael,

You can find the return shipping label attached to this message. Your return will be processed by Chronopost. Simply drop off your package at a nearby return location listed here: 

To prepare for your return:
1. Follow the instructions on how to return an item at <https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions>
2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product
3. Remove any existing protective wrapping or film
4. Wrap your product and its accessories according to the tips below

How to wrap your product:
• The box should be strong and stable, with your product positioned so it won't move during transit.
• Attach the return shipping label on top of the box (you can also attach a backup label inside for identification in case the original label is lost or damaged).
• Take photos of the package from inside and out before sending. This will protect you in case your product is damaged during transit.

Your return is now ready to be dropped off! We'll notify you when it arrives at our facility.

Best regards,
Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Regards,
